event.name: SynBio Reactor Summit
event.focus: Connecting biotech startups with investors, fostering European bio-based ecosystem

pitch_contest.name: Startup Pitch Contest
pitch_contest.description: Biotech startups compete for prizes and investor attention
benefits: Exposure to media and industry leaders
Networking with fellow founders and ecosystem partners

networking.description: Curated networking sessions connecting startups, investors, academics, and industry partners

recognition_program.connector_listing: Listed as official connector on event website and materials
recognition_program.special_supporter: Featured on physical banner at the event venue in Berlin
recognition_program.requirements: Frequently like and share posts about the SynBio Reactor Summit on social media

nonprofit_context.limitation: As a non-profit organization, it is not possible for us to use paid advertising to promote the event.
nonprofit_context.community_reliance: Instead, we rely on biotech community members like you to help spread the word about the summit.
